Class CharacterMappper

extends Object
    Maps characters not wanted in a speaking URL. FIXME Fix Arabic diactrics.
    Author:
    Sascha Droste , Sven Strittmatter

      • knowsCharacter

        boolean knowsCharacter(String ch)
        Whether the maps know the character to mapCharacter.

        Returns:

      • mapCharacter

        String mapCharacter(String ch)
        Maps a given character.

        Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the given character is not knwon.

        Parameters:
        ch - must not be null
        Returns:
        never null
